articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: After decades of talk, Seagate seems ready to actually drop the HAMR hard drives - Ars Technica
articles.description: At least one gigantic cloud provider has signed off on the drives’ viability.

articles.author: Haven Orecchio-Egresitz, Grace Eliza Goodwin
articles.title: Tech consultant is convicted of second-degree murder in killing of Cash App founder Bob Lee - Business Insider
articles.description: Nima Momeni was found guilty of second-degree murder in the April 2023 killing of Cash App founder Bob Lee.
articles.content:
A San Francisco jury found Nima Momeni guilty of second-degree murder in the fatal stabbing of 43-year-old Bob Lee, the creator of Cash App
.
